bibl.title: The Administration of the Ptolemaic Possessions outside Egypt.

series.title: Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition.

bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., The Administration of the Ptolemaic Possessions outside Egypt. (Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition. IV.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1976, 8°, xvi-286 pp. et 3 cartes.
S.E.G. XXVI, 1878; XXVII, 1196 (C.R. par Luigi Moretti).

C.R. par Ph. Gauthier, RD 4e s., 55 (1977) pp. 276-278. - H. Heinen, Gnomon 52 (1980) pp. 386-387. - G. Nachtergael, AntCl 48 (1979) pp. 373-375. - J.A.S. Evans, Phoenix 32 (1978) pp. 162-164. - P. M. Fraser, CR N.S., 28 (1978) pp. 310-313. - B. Klakowicz, StPap 16 (1977) pp. 126-131. - Luigi Moretti, RivFC 105 (1977) pp. 357-365 [concerne aussi: W. Huss, Untersuchungen zur Aussenpolitik Ptolemaios' IV. (München, 1976)]. - E. Van 't Dack, ChrEg 52 (1977) No. 104, pp. 369-373.
